Title: Requires New York city water board to wait at least thirty days after adoption of the city budget before setting its annual rates
Summary: Requires the New York city water board to wait at least thirty days after adoption of the city budget before setting its annual fees, rates, rents or other charges for the use of the sewage system or water system, or both.
LawCode: Amd ยง1045-j, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to requiring the New York city water board to wait at least thirty days after the adoption of the New York city executive budget to establish the annual fees and charges for the use of the sewerage system and water system
